Growing Up NYC
  • Patterns

GROWINGUP NYC Patterns Library

The Patterns of Growing Up NYC are a shared vocabulary between the code, design, and user interface (UI) of

GROWINGUP NYC.

Growing Up NYC supports the cognitive, social-emotional, and physical development of all New York City children by shaping City policies, agency practices and program development.

Browse the Patterns

Features

  • Multi-lingual stylesheets with right-to-left and left-to-right reading orientations.
  • Mobile-first stylesheets with support for modern browsers back to Internet Explorer 11.
  • Module-based design patterns with CSS and JavaScript included for each pattern.
  • Tailwindcss integration.

Instalation

The Patterns are available as an NPM package and can be installed with the following command.

npm install @nycopportunity/guny-patterns

All of the source code is publicly available and can also be integrated via cdn. See the intallation docs for more details and usage.

Get Started
